materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"1blgm","text":"Qiagen QIAamp Biostic Bacteremia DNA kit (for bead tubes and reagents only), cat# 12240-50","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgamf","text":"Qiagen DNeasy UltraClean 96 Microbial Kit (for DNA columns only), cat# 10196-4","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"na06","text":"USA Scientific 2.0 ml deep 96-well PP plate, sterile, cat #1896-2110","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1tl0k","text":"Vacuum manifold for 96 well plate","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"qh4v","text":"Secure the PowerBead Tube horizontally using the Vortex Adapter tube holder for the vortex (cat. no. 13000-V1-24). Vortex at maximum speed for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":143,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"13ph1","text":"due to limited vortex attachments you have to vortex in batches of 48 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":70}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":600,"guid":"103E400080E311ED800C91231EC09474","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"90p80","text":"Transfer the supernatant with a multichannel pipette to 2ml deep 96 well plate containing BB solution.  Pipette or pulse vortex to mix. Briefly centrifuge to collect any liquid from the top of the lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fkucq","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d2bki","text":"Place 96 well DNA column plate on a vacuum manifold and load  of lysate to the wells. Turn on vacuum and allow all liquid to pass through.
